title: Executive Order-Amendments of Civil Service Rules
content: Clause (c) of section 2 of General Rule III is hereby revoked, and clauses (d), (e), (f), (g), and (h) are lettered, respectively, (c), (d), (e), (f), and (g).
citation: Benjamin Harrison, Executive Order-Amendments of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/205704
